hero.headline: Manage Multiple Client Accounts with Ease

benefits.title: Redemption of interest

benefits.title: Working capital

features.title: Central Command Center
features.description: Switch between client accounts instantly without logging out. Manage 10 or 100 clients from a single dashboard.

features.title: White-Label Reporting

features.title: Revenue Share Model
features.description: Earn recurring revenue for every client you bring to the Cravings platform. A partnership that pays.

reviews.author: James Wilson
reviews.text: Managing 15 restaurants used to be a nightmare. Cravings made it scalable. The white-label reports are fantastic.

reviews.author: Anita Roy
reviews.text: My clients love the dashboard, and I love the ease of setup. Setup time went from 3 days to 30 minutes.
